message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $150. I think you'll find it's a very good deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable paying $130 for it.
